How Kayla Zimmerman Became an Agent

 Feb 24, 2022

Feb 24, 2022

Kayla Zimmerman’s story of how she joined Team Gabriel as a new agent.

Today Kayla Zimmerman is sharing her experience of joining Team Gabriel and working with us:

“I always knew I wanted to be a Realtor; I just didn’t know where to start. When I found Team Gabriel, I applied to be an assistant, but when Lori and Joe interviewed me, they decided I would make a good Realtor. I joined the team in August 2020 during the pandemic. They were very supportive, and I was excited to jump right into being a real estate agent because that was my ultimate goal.”

“I love the daily support we get.”

“They walked me through all the steps of how to get my license and got me settled into the job of a Realtor. I got my license for Connecticut and Massachusetts, and I love my job. Team Gabriel was very helpful with everything I needed, and I love the daily support we get; they’re always there to answer questions or help with any challenges we face. They help us reach our goals, cheer us on, and congratulate us when we succeed. “

“So far this year, I’ve sold 15 houses, which wouldn’t have been possible on any other team. I wouldn’t be where I am today without Team Gabriel. If you’re considering becoming a Realtor, I 100% recommend working with them.”

If you have any questions or would like to hear more about joining our team, call or email us. We would love to speak with you.

    About Lori Gabriel


    As a real estate veteran and experienced broker since 1993, I have worked hard over the past 26 years to build my brand and business. Having extensive knowledge and experience in the real estate market both in Connecticut and Massachusetts, I have had the privilege of helping hundreds of my clients achieve their house visions throughout the years. Helping clients has become second nature to me over the course of my lifetime and I truly enjoy working in the real estate industry. As a certified real estate Broker, I have received dozens of specialty achievement awards and certifications including, ABR (Accredited Buyer Representative) and CRS (Certified Residential Specialist), for my dedication to real estate. As a member of the Cartus Relocation Company, I have the opportunity to assist in relocating families from coast to coast, USAA Military Families and Navy Federal Credit Union families too. Specializing in single family residences, I also work closely with Builders and Developers to sell new construction homes and developments, and have had the pleasure of building many long life relationships along the way. When you are considering buying or selling, I hope you’ll consider me, to help guide you through the process, I promise to get you to where you want to be!

    Lori Gabriel
